title: What to do with Udhiya or Qurbani meat? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: [Music] [Music] foreign [Music] what should i do with my well the sunnah is to eat from it the sunnah is to give people i love from it and the sunnah is to give the poor parts of it as mentioned in the quran allah azzawajal ordered us to eat from it and to feed the poor and the needy so this is part of the sunnah now may allah be pleased with him said that the prophet saw said eat feed and save so i can do this but what should i do with the portions of it this is an issue of dispute among scholarship [Music] foreign [Music]
